title: Friday Pt2: Week 3 Matchups, HC Ron Rivera, Nate Burleson, Kareem Jackson, and Pickle Picks!
itunes:title: Friday Pt2: Week 3 Matchups, HC Ron Rivera, Nate Burleson, Kareem Jackson, and Pickle Picks!
description:
Part Two of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with some of the biggest game previews for Week 3.  Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara welcome Head Coach Ron Rivera to discuss Carson Wentz hosting his old Eagles teammates along with Hispanic Heritage Month.  Nate Burleson applauds Steelers WR George Pickens amazing catch, even in a loss.  Broncos Safety Kareem Jackson drops by to talk about Russell Wilson and facing Jimmy G on Sunday Night. Before heading to London for next week, we wrap up with Pickle Picks!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Before heading to London for next week, we wrap up with Pickle Picks!
